alert.note: Alert for Gurabo (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued November 06 at 12:52AM AST until November 06 at 3:00AM AST by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 AM AST EARLY THIS MORNING... ...REPLACES FLASH FLOOD WARNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by the previous rainfall is still occurring. * WHERE...A portion of Puerto Rico, including the following county, Gurabo. * WHEN...Until 245 AM AST. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1249 AM AST, USGS River Gauge sensors indicated that Rio Gurabo is still over its flood stage. Flooding is already occurring in the warned area. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
